exchange_master_bronze.name: Little Wonders
exchange_master_bronze.description: You found joy in small transactions. Remember, even little wonders can be huge.

exchange_master_silver.name: Express Yourself
exchange_master_silver.description: Your goods always arrive on time. Time is money, so make sure to Express Yourself.

exchange_master_gold.name: What Have You Done For Me Lately?
exchange_master_gold.description: Mastery in exchanges achieved. May fate be kind and give you what you ask for.

exchange_master_platinum.name: How the West Was Won
exchange_master_platinum.description: The peak of trade. Time for celebration! Go West!

trusted_trader_bronze.name: I Got You Babe
trusted_trader_bronze.description: The first thread of trust has been spun. Believing in others is the start of every relationship.

trusted_trader_silver.name: Can't Take My Eyes Off You
trusted_trader_silver.description: Trust is a currency more precious than gold. Tell us, Can't You Take Your Eyes Off?

trusted_trader_gold.name: Bette Davis Eyes
trusted_trader_gold.description: You are perceived as the golden standard. It must be the Bette Davis Eyes.

trusted_trader_platinum.name: Sweet Child O' Mine
trusted_trader_platinum.description: Let others feel at home with the Sweet Child O' Mine hovering over their heads.

perfect_rating_bronze.name: S01E01: Pilot
perfect_rating_bronze.description: Every great story has a beginning.

perfect_rating_silver.description: We hear this caliber always hits the bullseye.

perfect_rating_gold.name: Shotgun
perfect_rating_gold.description: This is no accident, it's a steady hand.

perfect_rating_platinum.name: Granite State
perfect_rating_platinum.description: Hard proof that you are one of the best.

book_collector_bronze.name: Act I: First Volume
book_collector_bronze.description: The collection has begun. Act I: First Volume takes the stage.

book_collector_silver.name: Ancient Grudge, Break to New Mutiny
book_collector_silver.description: A sizable collection. Remember that ancient grudges, break to new mutiny are hidden in books.

book_collector_gold.name: Scroll of the Forgotten
book_collector_gold.description: A treasure-worthy collection. How did you discover the Scroll of the Forgotten?

book_collector_platinum.name: Universal Nomenclature of Rarity
book_collector_platinum.description: The collection of rare volumes is complete. The Universal Nomenclature of Rarity is known to you.

social_butterfly_bronze.name: I'm New Here
social_butterfly_bronze.description: First acquaintances made. Come on, admit it, you're new here, right?

social_butterfly_silver.name: Camp Connector
social_butterfly_silver.description: You know people from different camps. Your influence is growing.

social_butterfly_gold.name: Diego's Ol' Friend
social_butterfly_gold.description: You are now a respected companion of the Old Camp.

social_butterfly_platinum.name: To Gomez!
social_butterfly_platinum.description: Raise a toast in his very own chamber. To Gomez!

generous_giver_bronze.name: Give A Little Sign
generous_giver_bronze.description: The first act of generosity. Keep the streak going, it's worth it.

generous_giver_silver.name: Time After Time
generous_giver_silver.description: Your gift has value. Share what is most precious.

generous_giver_gold.name: Total Eclipse of the Heart
generous_giver_gold.description: Golden level of generosity. It‚Äôs clear you give straight from the heart.

generous_giver_platinum.name: Jim Best
generous_giver_platinum.description: You are The Best at sharing with others.

thoughtful_reviewer_bronze.name: The Freelancer (No. 145)
thoughtful_reviewer_bronze.description: The first good review written without coercion.

thoughtful_reviewer_silver.name: The Debt Collector (No. 46)
thoughtful_reviewer_silver.description: In-depth reviews only, your words are worth silver.

thoughtful_reviewer_gold.name: The Judge (No. 57)
thoughtful_reviewer_gold.description: An insightful and fair reviewer is a good reviewer.

thoughtful_reviewer_platinum.name: Raymond Reddington (No. 00)
thoughtful_reviewer_platinum.description: One of a kind. The top of The Blacklist.

loyal_member_bronze.name: Circle of Friends
loyal_member_bronze.description: You are now a member of our group. Trust is a luxury, but Popping Cherry is essential.

loyal_member_silver.name: Popping Cherry
loyal_member_silver.description: You stick to the Code, even when everyone else is asleep in the big city.

loyal_member_gold.name: In an Unexpected Way
loyal_member_gold.description: Long tenure. Life as a dream, but you know there's more beneath the perfect facade.

loyal_member_platinum.name: Resistance Is Futile
loyal_member_platinum.description: Wow. Certain patterns repeat, but do you remember the monsters? Resistance Is Futile.

pioneer.name: Dances with Wolves
pioneer.description: One of the first people to face the new challenges. The territory has been settled.

summer_harvest.name: Summer Lovin'
summer_harvest.description: The summer harvest season is complete. Hear the sea and the Summer Lovin' sound.

best_of_the_best.name: "The Man Who Can't Be Moved"
best_of_the_best.description: The best of the best. Nothing can move you from here.
